subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|鐙%骨|あぶみ%こつ}}, {{ja-r|鐙%骨|とう%こつ}}: [[stapes]]
* {{ja-r|陰%茎%骨|いん%けい%こつ}}: [[baculum]]
* {{ja-r|烏%喙%骨|う%かい%こつ}}: [[coracoid]] {{gloss|bone}}
* {{ja-r|烏%口%骨|う%こう%こつ}}: [[coracoid]] {{gloss|bone}}
* {{ja-r|烏%骨%鶏|う%こっ%けい}}: [[silky]], [[silkie]] {{gloss|breed of chicken}}
* {{ja-r|烏%啄%骨|う%たく%こつ}}: [[coracoid]] {{gloss|bone}}
* {{ja-r|顴%骨|かん%こつ}}, {{ja-r|顴%骨|けん%こつ}}: [[cheekbone]]
* {{ja-r|砧%骨|きぬた%こつ}}, {{ja-r|砧%骨|ちん%こつ}}: [[incus]]
* {{ja-r|胸%骨|きょう%こつ}}: [[sternum]], [[breastbone]]
* {{ja-r|頬%骨|きょう%こつ}}: [[cheekbone]]
* {{ja-r|距%骨|きょ%こつ}}: [[anklebone]]
* {{ja-r|鯨%骨|げい%こつ}}: [[whale]] [[bone]]
* {{ja-r|楔%状%骨|けつ%じょう%こつ}}: [[cuneiform bone]]
* {{ja-r|肩%甲%骨|けん%こう%こつ}}, {{ja-r|肩%胛%骨|けん%こう%こつ}}: [[shoulder blade]]
* {{ja-r|骨%格|こっ%かく}}: [[skeleton]]; [[framework]]; [[physique]], [[build]]
* {{ja-r|骨%角|こっ%かく}}: [[bone]] and [[horn]]; a [[protrude|protruding]], horn-like bone
* {{ja-r|骨%子|こっ%し}}: the [[gist]], the [[main]] [[point]]
* {{ja-r|骨%折|こっ%せつ}}: a [[bone]] [[fracture]], a [[broken]] bone
* {{ja-r|骨%頂|こっ%ちょう}}: {{qualifier|metaphorical}} the [[height]] or [[pinnacle]] of something, such as "the ''height'' of [[folly]]"
* {{ja-r|骨%董|こっ%とう}}: an [[antique]]; something [[ancient]] and [[anachronistic]], something very [[old-fashioned]]
* {{ja-r|骨%董%品|こっ%とう%ひん}}: an [[antique]]; something [[ancient]] and [[anachronistic]], something very [[old-fashioned]]
* {{ja-r|骨%牌|こっ%ぱい}}: a certain kind of traditional Japanese [[playing card]]; a certain [[mah-jongg]] [[tile]] [[depict]]ing [[animal]] [[bone]]s
* {{ja-r|骨%盤|こつ%ばん}}: the [[pelvis]]
* {{ja-r|鎖%骨|さ%こつ}}: [[clavicle]]
* {{ja-r|坐%骨|ざ%こつ}}: [[ischium]]
* {{ja-r|肢%骨|し%こつ}}: [[appendicular]] [[bone]]
* {{ja-r|指%骨|し%こつ}}: [[phalanx]]
* {{ja-r|趾%骨|し%こつ}}: [[phalanx]] (toe bone)
* {{ja-r|歯%骨|し%こつ}}: [[dentary bone]]
* {{ja-r|篩%骨|し%こつ}}: [[ethmoid bone]]
* {{ja-r|嘴%骨|し%こつ}}: [[rostral bone]]
* {{ja-r|膝%蓋%骨|しつ%がい%こつ}}: [[kneecap]]
* {{ja-r|尺%骨|しゃっ%こつ}}: [[ulna]]
* {{ja-r|踵%骨|しょう%こつ}}: [[heel bone]]
* {{ja-r|顳%顬%骨|しょう%じゅ%こつ}}: [[temporal bone]]
* {{ja-r|鋤%骨|じょ%こつ}}: [[vomer bone]]
* {{ja-r|脊%椎%骨|せき%つい%こつ}}: [[vertebra]]
* {{ja-r|接%骨|せっ%こつ}}: [[bonesetting]]
* {{ja-r|舌%骨|ぜつ%こつ}}: [[hyoid bone]]
* {{ja-r|仙%骨|せん%こつ}}: [[sacrum]]
* {{ja-r|側%頭%骨|そく%とう%こつ}}: [[temporal bone]]
* {{ja-r|大%腿%骨|だい%たい%こつ}}: [[femur]]
* {{ja-r|恥%骨|ち%こつ}}: [[pubis]]
* {{ja-r|蝶%形%骨|ちょう%けい%こつ}}: [[sphenoid bone]]
* {{ja-r|椎%骨|つい%こつ}}: [[vertebra]]
* {{ja-r|槌%骨|つち%こつ}}, {{ja-r|槌%骨|つい%こつ}}: [[malleus]]
* {{ja-r|蹄%骨|てい%こつ}}: [[coffin bone]]
* {{ja-r|橈%骨|とう%こつ}}: [[radius]]
* {{ja-r|頭%骨|とう%こつ}}: [[skull]]
* {{ja-r|頭%蓋%骨|とう%がい%こつ}}, {{ja-r|頭%蓋%骨|ず%がい%こつ}}: [[cranium]]
* {{ja-r|腓%骨|ひ%こつ}}: [[fibula]]
* {{ja-r|尾%骨|び%こつ}}: [[coccyx]], [[tailbone]]
* {{ja-r|尾%骶%骨|び%てい%こつ}}: [[coccyx]], [[tailbone]]
* {{ja-r|尾%閭%骨|び%りょ%こつ}}: [[coccyx]], [[tailbone]]
* {{ja-r|涙%骨|るい%こつ}}: [[lacrimal bone]]
* {{ja-r|肋%骨|ろっ%こつ}}: [[rib]]
* {{ja-r|背%骨|せ%ぼね}}: [[backbone]]

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}} {{wikipedia|Bone}} [[File:Gray252.png|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|骨}} (''hone''): a '''[[bone]]'''.]]
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ほね}} {{IPAchar|/pone/}} → {{IPAchar|/ɸone/}} → {{IPAchar|/hone/}} From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=ほね}}. Possibly cognate with Korean {{ko-inline|뼈||bone}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 2
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|かわら|hhira=かはら}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=かわら|archaic|rare}} a [[bone]], particularly a [[cover]]ing bone such as a [[skull]] or [[kneecap]]

subSections.title: Noun
